column4: Can anybody help me? Totem isn't playing dvds for me but Vlc does
will it autoplay them? or not at all?
not at all, but Vlc all works
not at all, but Vlc all works

mine was having trouble playing manually, but would autoplay fine... I installed totem-xine and  that made it work better... I don't know if that would help you or not though... you have libdvdcss2 installed?
Xubuntu is also for those who prefer xfce ;-D
I would suggest installing totem-xine and see if that helps...
it uses xine instead of gstreamer
I will lose gstreamer if I add xine
it will uninstall automatically... is that a problem? you can always reinstall it too...
I guess other programs can do streaming right
I have noticed only improvements from using xine... everything else works the same as it did with gstreamer except dvd's play better for me
Ok thanks for help , last question, I also have Kaffeine installed- will kde packaged cause havoc to gnome?
kde and gnome apps are generally pretty exchangeable... I used Kate and k9burner on gnome with no adverse affects
thx, oh  and as expected... with xine now totem is back
